post.author: DoctorEternal
post.body:
Does anyone know of a utility in max to make the models imported from md5loader actually animatable? When you import them, they have a bunch of control points, but no bones/rig, etc.

or--- does anyone have the models rigged finished in a max file?

Dr.E

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body: I use the Der_ton one (export/import), and all bones are rigged at import.
